actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to give priority consideration to selecting Pensacola and Perdido Bays as an estuary of national significance, and for other purposes.
short_title: Pensacola and Perdido Bays Estuary of National Significance Act of 2021

summary.text:
Pensacola and Perdido Bays Estuary of National Significance Act of 2021

This bill revises the National Estuary Program to require the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to give priority consideration to selecting the Pensacola and Perdido Bays in Florida and Alabama as estuaries of national significance. Under the existing program, the EPA protects and restores the water quality and ecological integrity of estuaries of national significance.
